name: Cream of the Crop (Roultitude, Escan, knotstoks)
name_original: Cream of the Crop (Roultitude, Escan, knotstoks)
description:
Made for Heritage Game Jam 2022 by roultitude, thaddeus, escan and knotstocks

1. How is your game relevant to the theme?

We wanted to model the idea of renewal with the renewal of an everyday ice cream uncle upgrading his setup to deliver icecreams while driving

2. What sort of experience / message are you hoping your game will bring across to the player?

We want to bring across a hectic experience where players have to balance between making the ice creams as well as focusing on driving on the road so as to not crash into anyone!

3. Why did you end up choosing the direction of your game?

We wanted to  try this idea as we wanted to merge 2 different genres and have the player manage between them
